comment: For years she criticized the RCC for how they treat women but has now converted to Islam--an oppressive system to women. Makes perfect (non)sense.
amr:
# ::snt For years she criticized the RCC for how they treat women but has now converted to Islam--an oppressive system to women. Makes perfect (non)sense.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / criticize-01
                  :ARG0 (s / she)
                  :ARG1 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "RCC"))
                  :ARG2 (t / thing
                        :manner-of (t2 / treat-01
                              :ARG0 o
                              :ARG1 (w / woman)))
                  :duration (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year))))
            :ARG2 (c3 / convert-01
                  :ARG1 o
                  :ARG2 (r / religious-group
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Islam")
                        :domain (s2 / system
                              :ARG0-of (o2 / oppress-01
                                    :ARG1 (w2 / woman))))
                  :time (n3 / now)))
      :snt2 (s3 / sense-02
            :ARG1-of (p / perfect-02)
            :polarity -))
